name: Compensation of commission members
text: §50-13  Compensation of commission members.  Members of the charter commission shall receive as compensation for their services the sum of $1,000 each, and shall be reimbursed by the county for their necessary expenses incurred in the performance of their duties. [L 1963, c 73, pt of §2; Supp, §143A-14; HRS §50-13]
